author: Manolo Vasquez

text:
Keep bringing light in these troubled times, SupraDarky! I never got into this series yet, but I see the soundtrack is wonderful.

Anyways, I'd like to randomly shout out "Highland," from Quest 64, since that game has yet to be covered. That game was mediocre at best, and honestly, the same goes for the music, but that Highland..

text: Agreed. AI1 didn't catch me that much and AI3 just threw me off with the complete style. But I did finish AI3 and it was a good game, but it didn't felt like AI too much.

text: OMG this game was one of my favourites, beautiful BGM and story, with a neat art style.
author: Butterfly Kiss

text: Love this one, great mix of guitars and piano making for a relaxingly beautiful theme. I haven't play too many of the games in the Atelier series, I really didn't pay any attention to it once it made its way on the PS3. I may fix that someday, especially now that I have a PS3 (and with how awesome The Last of Us looks, I'm glad I do).
author: SupraDarky
